t: To the chief Musician{H5329}{(H8764)}, A Psalm of David{H1732}. The fool{H5036} hath said{H559}{(H8804)} in his heart{H3820}, There is no God{H430}. They are corrupt{H7843}{(H8689)}, they have done abominable{H8581}{(H8689)} works{H5949}, there is none that doeth{H6213}{(H8802)} good{H2896}.

The LORD{H3068} looked down{H8259}{(H8689)} from heaven{H8064} upon the children{H1121} of men{H120}, to see{H7200}{(H8800)} if there{H3426} were any that did understand{H7919}{(H8688)}, and seek{H1875}{(H8802)} God{H430}.
They are all gone aside{H5493}{(H8804)}, they are all together{H3162} become filthy{H444}{(H8738)}: there is none that doeth{H6213}{(H8802)} good{H2896}, no, not one{H259}.

Have all the workers{H6466}{(H8802)} of iniquity{H205} no knowledge{H3045}{(H8804)}? who eat up{H398}{(H8802)} my people{H5971} as they eat{H398}{(H8804)} bread{H3899}, and call{H7121}{(H8804)} not upon the LORD{H3068}.
There were they in great{H6343} fear{H6342}{(H8804)}: for God{H430} is in the generation{H1755} of the righteous{H6662}.
Ye have shamed{H954}{(H8686)} the counsel{H6098} of the poor{H6041}, because the LORD{H3068} is his refuge{H4268}.

Oh that{H5414}{(H8799)} the salvation{H3444} of Israel{H3478} were come out of Zion{H6726}! when the LORD{H3068} bringeth back{H7725}{(H8800)} the captivity{H7622} of his people{H5971}, Jacob{H3290} shall rejoice{H1523}{(H8799)}, and Israel{H3478} shall be glad{H8055}{(H8799)}.
